WorkItem.ClosedComment: RTFM, the 'Enforce Gem Requirements' option will limit the Nightmare Tears to 1, the DragonsEye's to 3 and disable your Meta if you don't have the right activation gems.
WorkItem.Description: It continually shows me that nightmare tears would be best in the basically any and all sockets which they would be but they are unique-equipped so its not possible please fix this when you get a chance also if you need to know I am a shaman i donno if that has anything to do with the problem but I doubt it...
